name: Beet & Goat Cheese Quinoa Salad
description: Known as a “super seed,” quinoa contains about 50% more protein than other common grains: 8 g per 1 cup. It’s gluten free, high in calcium and iron, and a good source of vitamin B.
preparation: Combine quinoa and water in a Multipurpose Pot over medium-high heat. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer, stirring occasionally, until water is absorbed, about 15 min. Remove from heat and let stand 5 min.

Turn into a bowl and stir in chickpeas and dressing. Spread out on a Sheet Pan lined with a Sheet Pan Liner to cool, then turn back into bowl. Stir in beets, greens, bell pepper, and cheese. Season to taste.
Best served at room temperature. If making ahead, cover and refrigerate overnight.
tips: This recipe freezes well. Freeze in individual portions with 4 oz cooked, cubed chicken or 1 cup black beans/lentils to have an emergency meal ready to reheat and eat.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1 serving of lean protein.

products.name: Balsamic Vinaigrette Dressing Mix
summary: Fresh, bright & bold blend of Mediterranean herbs with notes of garlic & rosemary. Our most versatile dressing.

products.name: Greek Dressing Mix
summary: Herbs make salad dressings taste great, but they can be a pain to buy and use while fresh. Enter our Greek Dressing to solve the problem. Packed with only good food ingredients, including garlic, oregano, mint, and zero additives, it’s easy to make your own healthy dressing with this simple blend. Just mix it with olive oil and red wine vinegar and give it a shake. Add crumbled feta or Greek yogurt for a creamier dressing.

products.name: Sheet Pan
summary: Lightweight all-purpose baking sheet made from a single piece of aluminum, with a one-inch rim.

products.name: Sheet Pan Liner
summary: Nonstick silicone baking sheet. Ideal for baking, roasting, sheet pan meals & more!
